42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Al-Bara’ b. ‘Azib reported the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) as saying:When a Muslim is questioned in the grave he testifies that there is no god but Allah and that Muhammad is Allah’s Apostle. That is verified by Allah’s words: “Allah establishes those who believe with the word that stands firm.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَسْأَلَةِ فِي الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Questioning And Punishment In The Grave
